website_summaries.verdict: This easy to use kinesiology tape comes with a free "how-to" guide to speed up recovery and obtain the best results.
pros: Will stay on even during CrossFit workouts
Comes with a 100% money back guarantee
cons: Caused itchiness and skin reactions for some

customer_reviews.title: Product I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product is honestly so very helpful. Recommended by my daughter who came home for Xmas from London. It was recommended to her over there. My husband and I both use it with great success. I tried to redeem for my free roll to no avail though
customer_reviews.author: J. COTA

customer_reviews.title: Badd quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried A lot of different KT tape. This brand has a lot of different styles and colors but as the quality not very good as soon as you start sweating it starts releasing from the skin doesn't hold well at all. I won't get again because the quality not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Poff

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my knee pain, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: It works just as well as the KT brand. I like the different colors and patterns. Didn't mind cutting it into the length I needed and rounding the corners myself. Very cost effective. Just make sure you don't leave any tape on your skin for more than 3-5 days , can cause irritation no matter what brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying This product & so far so good. Adheres to my skin well, even after a shower. Only complaint is when you wear it multiple days & showers it frays, it doesn’t effect effectiveness but doesn’t look great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think it was helping !!!!
customer_reviews.text: When i first applied the tape i didn’t think it was doing anything. I left it on and then after a couple days took the tape off. After about three hours i noticed the pain increasing in my shoulder and realized how much the tape actually helped with pain! I had just had surgery on the shoulder and when i saw the doctor told her how much the tape helped and she said “keep taping it “. And btw it’s so easy to apply when you watch YouTube videos that my seventeen year old son applies it for me! Thank you spartan tape!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was told about this from my doctor and it is also used at the ski valley on bruise injuries.
customer_reviews.text: Great for injuries of bruising or need for drain of lymph nodes due to breast cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: pain management alternative to shoulder surgery
customer_reviews.text: I use KT daily & I'm able to apply it myself.....it's a major alternative to an expensive, hellish surgery, and even worse rehab......I've had my left shoulder done but just can't bear the thought of having my right "wing" fixed !! KT is the best thing for my situation & I can rock all the camo colors !
customer_reviews.author: Ann K  Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: This will not stay on my skin for more than 1 day..I need it to stay for 3 days for PT
customer_reviews.author: Debby L Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great assistance for arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: This assisted my arthritis - the gym seems more tolerable with Spartan placed in proper area. It helps not to pronate the knee and keep it in place. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Mallari

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a chronic knee pain. The tape has helped me restart an exercise routine , I had been shying away for long
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with this product. We needed kinesiotape and I ordered the cheaper brand thinking it would be just as good. It is NOT. The tape didn't have the same feel as the name brand stuff and it almost ripped my daughters skin off upon removal. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! The adhesive is vastly superior to other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Martin

customer_reviews.title: KT tape is amazing! This tape stays on so well and you ...
customer_reviews.text: KT tape is amazing! This tape stays on so well and you need very little to get the job done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great product. See how it helps you.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my toes straight. give comfort and support to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Vilardo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my foot and work in the healthcare field so I’m on my feet a lot. It has helped tremendously with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Remington

customer_reviews.title: Spartans tape
customer_reviews.text: I have been soar for a while but now I can feel the blood flowing back into my arm and hands.
customer_reviews.author: michelle page

customer_reviews.title: It has help the pain in my back a lot
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it stay on in the shower and does what is suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I will definitely be buying again. It does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous22392

customer_reviews.title: Good for preggo belly taping
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so the adhesive does bother my skin somewhat, but the relief from using this on my swollen belly (8.5 months pregnant) is like no other. I'm so happy this product exists.
customer_reviews.author: Joobri

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, even staying on in water. (Hot tub)
customer_reviews.author: AmandaRae

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved the design on the tape
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the design on the tape. Seemed to stay on as well as other brands we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley4642

product_meta.title: Sparthos Kinesiology Tape - Incredible Support for Athletic Sports and Recovery - Free Kinesiology Taping Guide! - Uncut 2 inch x 16.4 feet Roll
feature_bullets: ✅ SPEED UP YOUR RECOVERY AND ENJOY FREEDOM FROM PAIN - recover faster due to increased kinesio blood circulation and reduced inflammation. The SPARTHOS TAPE is designed to move with you, stretching when you stretch and flexing when you flex while providing long lasting gentle support therapy and aiding blood circulation to promote faster healing.

✅ INCREASE YOUR ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE - The SPARTHOS TAPE enables your muscles to more easily get back to neutral shape and is designed to work with your body and flex with your muscles to support, not restrict the area. It also gently lifts the skin to promote better blood circulation for increased sports performance.

✅ WATERPROOF AND LIGHTWEIGHT TECHNOLOGY - When properly applied, the SPARTHOS TAPE can stay on through 3-5 days of showering, crossfit workouts, gym sessions and beyond. This athletic tape does not irritate skin, because it is hypoallergenic and latex free.
✅ FREE 41-PAGE TAPING MANUAL - Step by step kinesiology tape application e-guide for your best results. You don't need to be a kt physical therapy expert to use the SPARTHOS TAPE.

✅ ORDER NOW - YOU HAVE NO RISK WITH OUR 100% GUARANTEE - If, for any reason, you don't like your SPARTHOS kinesiology tape, simply return it for a hassle-free, no questions asked refund. No catches. No hassles. You're always protected.
